intro: Solanum tenuissimum, commonly known as the slender nightshade, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a low-growing shrub that typically reaches a height of about 10 to 30 centimeters. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in the axils of the leaves. Its fruit is a small, yellowish berry that matures in late summer. Solanum tenuissimum is often found in dry, rocky habitats and is characterized by its hairy stems and leaves.
